articles.description: Clyburn criticized OSHA for failing “to adequately carry out its responsibility for enforcing worker safety laws,” resulting in infections and death.
articles.content:
The Biden administration is boosting purchases of coronavirus vaccines to deliver enough to protect 300 million Americans by the end of the summer.
Associated Press

articles.title: 'Get well' messages pour in for UK's Captain Tom, 100, in hospital with COVID - CNBC
articles.description: Discount online brokerage Robinhood said it has been able to raise another $2.4 billion from investors.
articles.content:
Discount online brokerage Robinhood said Monday it has raised another $2.4 billion from investors amid the extreme bouts of market volatility.
